body_html: @meder411 While the docs do look correct to me for describing normalized_shape, having it accept an integer for the most common use-case by far does seem worthwhile. If you're willing to submit a PR for this that'd be great, otherwise raise an issue (please tag me within) and someone will address it.

body: @meder411 While the docs do look correct to me for describing `normalized_shape`, having it accept an integer for the most common use-case by far does seem worthwhile. If you're willing to submit a PR for this that'd be great, otherwise raise an issue (please tag me within) and someone will address it.
